:'''Shyam:''' ...
:'''Shyam:''' Need any help?
:{{DIcon}} You are...
::'''Shyam:''' I was elected by the local residents... Um... I'm sort of a sheriff.
::'''Shyam:''' They probably called me in keep order because I used to be a mercenary in [[the Eremites]]. I've done many... jobs for them.

:{{DIcon}} Not at the moment.
::'''Shyam:''' Good.
